item.title: Latest drought report. The whole county is now in Extreme D
item.description: Latest drought report. The whole county is now in Extreme Drought condition. https://droughtmonitor.unl.edu/.../StateDroughtMonitor...

item.title: Aug 29, 2024: Heat and humidity finish out the week with the
item.description: Aug 29, 2024: Heat and humidity finish out the week with the heat index reaching over 100ยบ across the lowlands today and Friday. - The mountains have the best chance for afternoon showers and storms. - Widespread showers and storms bring some relief this weekend before drier air arrives for Labor Day. @NWSCharlestonWV weather.gov/rlx/briefing #WVwx
